description.narrative: The Project Development Objective is to increase availability, reliability and quality of grid based power supply to northern regions of Tanzania.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Project Agreement- Schedule- Section II.B.4 | Description :Except as the Association shall otherwise agree,TANESCO shall at all times maintain a DSCR equal to or greater that 1.15 | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Project Agreement- Schedule- Section II.B.6 | Description :TANESCO shall not incur new debt unless a reasonableforecast shows net annual revenues equal to or greater than 1.3 times the estimated debt service requirements of TANESCO in thefollowing FY | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2- Section I.A.1 (a) | Description :The Recipient shall ensure that TANESCO is maintained at all timesduring the implementation of the Project with functions, staffing and resources satisfactory to the Association. | Frequency:Quarterly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2- Section I.B | Description :To facilitate the carrying out of the Project, the Recipient shall makethe proceeds of the Financing available to TANESCO under a Subsidiary Agreement | Due Date :13-Jan-2011
Finance Agreement :Schedule 2- Section I.C | Description :The Recipient, through TANESCO, shall adopt Operating Guidelines in formand substance satisfactory to the Association. | Frequency :Quarterly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2- Section I.D | Description :The Recipient shall ensure that the Project is carried out in accordancewith the provisions of the Anti-Corruption Guidelines. | Frequency :Quarterly
